General.Name: Shandong Bohui Paper Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Bohui Paper Industry Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, imports, and exports paper products in China. The company offers food card series, such as double-sided coated food cards, paper cups, and coated paper cups; cigarette card series, which includes high-grade coated cigarette cards and caifiber anti-counterfeiting cigarette pack; white card series red-crowned crane, including red crowned crane double-sided coated white cards and double-sided coated white cards used for packaging of medicines, cosmetics, health care products, electronic products, daily necessities, digital products, handbags, and toys, as well as the packaging of various high-end commodities, such as hang tags, card books, greeting cards, postcards, and precision electronic products; and copper card series, such as double-sided copper cards, copper cards, and business cards used for clothing tags, desk calendars, high-end brochures, book covers, business cards, etc. It also provides whiteboard series; offset printing papers, coated papers, book papers, electrostatic copy papers used in teaching materials, books, student books, and other purposes; printing papers; and cow card series, such as kraft cardboards and white-faced cattle cards; and gypsum face papers. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.
General.Address: North Head of Industrial Road, Zibo, China, 256405
